item.title: Google Drive
item.description: DLP for Google DriveCloudflare Data Loss Prevention can inspect upload and download traffic to and from Google Drive. ​​ Configuring for compatibility ​​ Browsers No additional configuration is required to scan Google Drive traffic in a browser. ​​ Desktop app To use Cloudflare DLP with the Google Drive desktop app, you will need to configure Google Drive for desktop External link icon Open external link to trust the Cloudflare root certificate.
